ygData.subject: Re: Off Topic: King Ak'anon
ygData.msgSnippet: The staff segments are part of what I think is an unfinished druid/ranger quest. I am not sure what they turn into. Argynte ... From: Mad Grizzle
ygData.messageBody:
The staff segments are part of what I think is an unfinished
druid/ranger quest. I am not sure what they turn into.
Argynte
-----Original Message-----
From: Mad Grizzle <MadGrizzle@...>
To: EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com <EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com>
Date: Sunday, June 20, 1999 9:19 PM
Subject: Re: [EQ_Tinkering] Off Topic: King Ak'anon


>From: Mad Grizzle <MadGrizzle@...>
>
>I have the Skull of Jhen'Tra (or whatever its called) and i have two staff
>segments. maybe this is what gets combined. what do ya'll think? i have
seen
>nothing on the staff segments. got one off a bandit in east karana and the
other
>in a lockbox in highpass hold (bandit has the key). Been trying to find
out what
>the segments are for and how to combine.
>
>
>DBellassai@... wrote:
>
>> From: DBellassai@...
>>
>> Hmm ive heard that to but i talk to a friend on the pvp server and he
says
>> he seen the finished product. I dont think he was making it up casue
he
>> confronted me about tinkering and asked if i new how to make one. Also
ive
>> been to a few web sittes that kinda talk about it. Its mentioned that
there
>> is a third componet to combine to make this staff. To bad they wouldnt
say,
>> also the priest discord has that black robe. When i first started i
thought
>> it was just for show but the higher i get in levels i starting to see
other
>> people wear this robe. You can get that robe in a dungeon. I also
tried to
>> combine the skull and rune totum staff and it tells me that they dont
>> combine.
>>
